specials.name: Absorb Wraith
specials.description: The herecite extends its hand toward another herecite within 100 feet. The target herecite dissolves and streaks toward the herecite in a straight line, dealing 6d10 negative damage to each creature along the line (DC 28 basic Fortitude save). The herecite absorbs the essence of the target wraith, becoming quickened and gaining a +10-foot status bonus to its fly Speed for a number of rounds equal to the level of the absorbed herecite. It can use its extra action only to Fly or Strike. An unwilling target can attempt a DC 28 Will save to resist being absorbed.
Sunlight Powerlessness A herecite caught in sunlight is stunned 2 and clumsy 2.

specials.name: Drain Life
specials.description: (divine, necromancy) When the herecite damages a living creature with its spectral hand Strike, the herecite gains 10 temporary Hit Points and the target must succeed at a DC 28 Fortitude save or become drained 1. Further damage dealt by the wraith increases the drained condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

specials.name: Wraith Spawn
specials.description: (divine, necromancy) A living humanoid slain by a herecite’s spectral hand Strike rises as a wraith spawn after 1d4 rounds. This wraith spawn is under the command of the herecite that killed it. It doesn't have drain life or wraith spawn. If the creator of the wraith spawn dies, the wraith spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous wraith; it regains its free will and gains drain life and wraith spawn.

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious
